help.title: Reseller Management
help.information: An Administrator assigns any desired sites definitely to one Reseller. These sites then can be just administrated by this special Reseller. Here, he has to keep to the limitations given by the Administrator. He may apply - according to the limits - any desired Customers and also manage them. In contrast to the Administrator, he cannot take up changes to the system settings, to the field-configuration in the addressbook and it is not possible for him to analyse the database. In addition to that he cannot gain access to the customers belonging to another Reseller of course.

section.head: Reseller Name
section.description: This is the Name of the Reseller as it is e.g. shown in the Event-Log. At login this name has to be prefixed by "res_", so that XAMS knows wich kind of user it has to validate.

section.head: Reseller Password
section.description: In conjunction with the Name and this Password, the Reseller can login to the XAMS GUI.

section.head: Max. Customers
section.description: This value defines, how much Customers a Reseller can create.

section.head: Max. Sites
section.description: This value defines, how much Sites a Reseller can create.

section.head: Max. Domains
section.description: This value defines, how much Domains a Reseller can create.

section.head: Max. Users
section.description: This value defines, how high a reseller can set the User-Limit on Site-Level. Example: A Reseller has a limit of 20 Users, so he can set the User-Limit of one Site to 5 and of another Site to 15. So, the sum of all User-Limits on Site-Level can not exceed this limit. This value does only affects the maximum amount of Reseller's Users indirect.

section.head: Max. Aliases
section.description: Analog zu den Benutzern kann hier darüber bestimmt werden, wie hoch das Alias-Limit aller Sites eines Wiederverkäufers sein darf.

section.head: Max. Quota
section.description: The "Max. Quota" defines the maximum site of all Site-Quotas (resp. the sum of them) of a reseller.

section.head: Max. Site-Quota
section.description: This value defines, how much Site-Quota a Reseller can assign to a Site.

section.head: Max. User-Quota
section.description: This value defines, how much User-Quota a Reseller can assign to a user. Thereby the Site-Level Quota can not be exceeded.

section.head: Viruscheck
section.description: Here can be determined if this Reseller can enable Viruschecking for his Sites resp. their users.

section.head: Spamcheck
section.description: Here can be determined if this Reseller can enable Spamchecking for his Sites resp. their users.

section.head: Sites
section.description: Here, an Administrator can assign one or several Sites to a specific Reseller. The Reseller can then assign these Sites to his Customers or administrate them by himself.

section.head: Account locked
section.description: Using this option, an Administrator can lock Resellers. Thereby he can't login the XAMS GUI anymore.
